author: Special Correspondent
text: A local court has sentenced three persons to life imprisonment in connection with the murder of a farmer. According to prosecution, M. Padalingam (50) of Pottal near Kallidaikurichi was murdered by L. Jegan (32), S. Murugan (35) and S. Murugesan (35), all from the same area, on September 25, 2013, following an altercation over harvesting palmyrah tuber planted at a particular spot. Fourth Additional Sessions Judge Gladson Blessed Tagore awarded life imprisonment to the trio and slapped a fine of Rs. 1,000 each on them on Friday.
title: Three persons get life term for murder
